definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish

sentences.english: That’s because the friction of the wheels and track slowly drain energy away from the train.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲輪子與軌道的摩擦力會逐漸削弱車體的能量。

sentences.english: The forces due to friction are called frictional forces.
sentences.chinese: 由於摩擦而產生的力稱之爲摩擦力。

sentences.english: They have rubber synthetics that greatly enhance one’s friction on the rock.
sentences.chinese: 它們是由橡膠製成的，能夠增強在岩石上的摩擦力。

sentences.english: These attributes include the density of the object and the friction.
sentences.chinese: 這些屬性包括物體的密度和摩擦力。

sentences.english: The friction between the beams is neglected.
sentences.chinese: 諸梁間之摩擦力略去不計。

sentences.english: High friction levels of the standing hair fibers (nylon) effectively prevent mud sliding sideways .
sentences.chinese: 立毛纖維之高摩擦力，有效攔阻污泥防止側漏。

sentences.english: The quadrant glitches were due to friction brought about transient phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 象限誤差主要是因爲摩擦力帶來的暫態現象。

sentences.english: But I'm only interested in the magnitude for now, so I get R times the frictional force.
sentences.chinese: 我現在只對它的大小感興趣，是R乘以摩擦力。

sentences.english: The advantage of rolling bearing is that they cause less friction.
sentences.chinese: 滾動軸承的優點是它產生的摩擦力較小。

sentences.english: The unique form-fitting rubber coating provides optimal grip and protection.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的塗膠技術提供了最優的摩擦力和保護。

sentences.english: In the absence of friction belted machinery would not be used.
sentences.chinese: 沒有摩擦力，皮帶傳動的機器就無法使用。

sentences.english: StaticFriction is the friction between two surfaces are not moving relative to eachother.
sentences.chinese: 靜摩擦是在兩個互相不運動的物體間的摩擦力。

sentences.english: The friction force is therefore called a nonconservative or a dissipative force.
sentences.chinese: 因此，摩擦力稱爲非保守力或耗散力。

sentences.english: Friction models and static characteristics of electrohydraulic servo motors are given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 給出了摩擦力模型和電液伺服馬達的靜態特性。

sentences.english: Viscous friction is the fiction, or resistance to relative motion, between adjacent layers of liquid.
sentences.chinese: 粘性是液體流層問相對運動而產生的摩擦力或阻力。

definition: lever arm (i.e. perpendicular distance from the fulcrum to the line of force)
